stories.title: User Authentication
stories.userStory: As a user, I want to create an account and log in securely.
acceptanceCriteria: The user can create an account and log in securely.
The user can log out securely.

stories.title: Dashboard View
stories.userStory: As a user, I want a dashboard that shows me key metrics and information at a glance.
acceptanceCriteria: The user can view a dashboard with key metrics and information at a glance.
The user can view a dashboard with key metrics and information at a glance.

stories.title: Export to PDF
stories.userStory: As a user, I want to export reports to PDF format.
acceptanceCriteria: The user can export reports to PDF format.
The user can export reports to PDF format.
